clusters.title: Rising Homeschooling
clusters.description: Homeschooling in the U.S. has seen a significant rise, with 6% of school-age children being homeschooled during the 2021-2022 school year. This surge is part of a broader trend, as evidenced by the 3.7 million homeschool students recorded in the 2020-2021 period. The homeschooling population continues to grow at an estimated rate of 8% annually, reflecting its increasing popularity and adoption among families.
